place.name: SUDBOROUGH
place.gazetteerText: SUDBOROUGH, a parish in Thrapston district, Northampton; 3¼ miles NNW of Thrapston r. station. It has a post-office under Thrapston. Acres, 1,781. Real property, £2,646. Pop., 321. Houses, 70. The manor belongs to the Duke of Cleveland. There is a large brewery. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Peterborough. Value, £400.* Patron, the Bishop of P. The church is plain. Charities, £27. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
